website_summaries.verdict: What city is complete without a train? The perfect set for LEGO and train lovers.
pros: A motorized train with two passenger cars, two passengers, an engineer, and a train attendant make for a well-equipped set
Remote control works to run the engine
Nice gift for model train collectors
cons: There's not a lot of track included, so you may want to buy an extension pack

customer_reviews.title: 5-yr old plays with it every day
customer_reviews.text: Our kids loves legos and trains, so this was the perfect gift. It took a couple of evenings to put it together, but it was a lot of fun. The train runs very fast, so we had to add a bit of camber to the tracks to be able to run it at max speed. After several months, he still plays every day with the train and other legos. He adds more legos on top, makes tunnels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: It's Lego Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. Great quality, which is expected from Lego. They never disappoint. My son had tuns of fun putting this together with my help. Nedless to say we had a great time together. Now he has tuns of fun running it. I also bought extra track.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Bought for our 6 year old grandson's birthday
customer_reviews.text: Lego products are the favorites for all 5 of our grandchildren. I bet we've spent $2,500 on Lego sets over the years for them. These are awfully expensive for a bunch of plastic pieces but they love them, That's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Kids of all ages will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our grandson who loves and lives trains! This is part of his Lego City and circles around town. He loves the remote control feature. Just like his HO and N scale trains, but he built it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Logan

customer_reviews.title: The cost doesn't justify the value, came with the missing parts
customer_reviews.text: LEGO City Passenger Train 60197 Building Kit is a very simple, not "sophisticated" toy for this money. It is small kit, and the picture of train is very misleading. The box was closed and undamaged but 2 parts were missing from original LEGO package. The missing parts are magnets to connect the train cars so one car can't be connected to other car. We used to buy lots of LEGO's kits for our kids and this one is extremely disappointed, especially because it is a gift. Do not waste your money on it!
customer_reviews.author: victor l

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Fun to Build
customer_reviews.text: While I don't think the current Lego trains are as awesome as the older ones, this train really impressed me. It was a lot of fun to build and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Amazon could have a better packing
customer_reviews.text: My son is a lego fan and he likes it very much. But I want to complain about Amazon’s packaging, there is no extra box for standard shipping, the shipping label was put outside of the LEGO box and blocked some pictures. You know, as a fan, my son even collects the box and definitely want it as good status instead of shipping label on it and can’t remove it. There could be a clear plastic wrap placed outside of the box, this is called appropriate packing, not over packing.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Fun train
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old Grandson loves it and that’s what counts. Wish it had some auxiliary bridges, stations but he made it work with other pieces he had... and cardboard boxes! Of course he could not put it together himself but great project for him and his dad. Took about a week. Teaches patience and reward!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Dean

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The train does not work. We put batteries in the train and the remote. It does not work. We paid a premium at $189.99, when it’s cheaper at a Walmart and Target online. So, I’d expect it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great big gift for my 6y old son
customer_reviews.text: I find it pricey, but my son has enjoyed a lot building it by himself. It's good quality. All pieces and train motor run smoothly and greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Alb.

customer_reviews.title: Best Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Birthday guft for 7yr old grandson. He loves it. Onky problem is that he builds them so fast now.
customer_reviews.author: tj52

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Joy
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 5year old, it's an absolute joy to build and use. The phone-based controller has a lot of additional features not present in the remote controller.
customer_reviews.author: Anirudha Maitra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 year Old, he can build it by himself in 4 hours. He like it very much.he want to build more But i am poor. Wo wo.
customer_reviews.author: Songde

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Set!
customer_reviews.text: This kit includes everything you need to setup a gorgeous passenger train. Give it a shot, i'ts enjoyable as a standalone set but I highly recommend building a "LEGO Town" along the track!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect train but poor motor battery design
customer_reviews.text: Love the train but the motor blows through 6 AAA batteries in 20 minutes! Definitely need a battery charger if using this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson likes this set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to the existing freight train that Lego has. Fairly easy to assemble and runs well around the track.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Schock

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as always!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It runs well. Instructions organized as always and my 10 year old assembled it by himself.
customer_reviews.author: MC in TX

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this new lego for his collection. He enjoyed putting the engines together. I was very impressed with the whole kit.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Saxe

customer_reviews.title: Train doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I tried a lot of different batteries, the train just doesn't work. Since it was a birthday gift purchased 2 months in advance, we didnt open it within the return time period and now we are out of luck and stuck with an expensive piece of junk :(
customer_reviews.author: Meera Sutaria

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson sat down with his dad and built the entire set. My son did none of the work but read the directions to my grandson who did the work.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Functional and rebuildable.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this birthday present. Assembled it in one sitting... several hours. Plays with it nonstop. He is able to take it apart and rebuild it without assistance or instructions and loves the electric engine function
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Manning

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 6 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Gramma hit it out of the ballpark with this one! He loves it and has played with it since Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisbry

customer_reviews.title: broken product
customer_reviews.text: A birthday gift for my son, arrived with a broken box and missing parts... 0 star
customer_reviews.author: Lian He

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pieces but easy to build. My 8 year old nearly built it on his own!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.  Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego but Power Hungry.  Make sure you have lots of AAA batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Fun Lego but you need 9 AAA batteries to get started and 6 more after each long play session.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Galperin

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product but costly. My grandson loved it. In this value some more track pieces should have been added to make it more interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh Kumar Singh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and my grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old grandson Assembled and was playing with the train in about an hour...he LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Vrabel

customer_reviews.title: Love Legos
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. My boys love playing with it. I would recommend getting extra tracks though.
customer_reviews.author: Shady719

customer_reviews.title: This is not hard to
customer_reviews.text: It is an incredible product and is a great toy
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Love this lego set
customer_reviews.text: got this for my nephew for Christmas. he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mae Be

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old loved building this with me! Runs great on the track!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Fun,Fun,Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good.lego set.will buy it agan soon for more cars and parts.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This was easier to build than many other LEGO sets. The engine worked flawlessly and is very quiet. My 7 year old got this for his birthday. He loves it! The build was a little difficult for him alone so we just built it together. I’ve probably spent thousands of dollars on LEGO sets. This is easily my favorite. Totally worth the $!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Froelich

customer_reviews.title: Great product that is super nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my 7-year old grandson. He had the thing together and running on the tracks in 2-hours. If your child is mechanically inclined and has Lego experience, this will not keep them busy very long. I was extremely happy with the quality of the kit and the knowledge he gained about the parts of a train during construction. The remote control is a nice touch. My part is always to lay out the pieces on the table in an orderly fashion, so that he only has to concentrate of the assembly, which keeps me busy staying ahead of him.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool set with great control options
customer_reviews.text: Wow - a really cool Lego set even without the electric power and Bluetooth control. The train design itself is really cool, except for the lack of a rear car (I built one from parts for the one in my video). It great that it includes a remote control in addition to the option of using a phone/tablet device app! Plus they you can switch back and forth between the two. The train actually moves along pretty fast and it doesn’t eat batteries. Aside from the lack of a rear car, the only other thing missing is the optional headlight kit - which adds another $10 if you can even find one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave V

customer_reviews.title: Superior Design
customer_reviews.text: It runs well at moderately high speeds. Check out the videos by hobbyist's on YouTube. Pluses: high quality design and function, adaptable with additional track, two trains can be connected and run together (this is frequently shown on YouTube). Minuses: It's a challenging build possibly unsuitable for small children, there are many small parts and attachments that might come loose, it's not that expandable in terms of additional add on cars. Most kids would probably prefer the Lego freight train set to this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a lego train and this being my 1st one I have quite enjoyed it. It went together with no issues. I would recommend getting some rechargeable batteries and the controller is bluetooth so you can hook up two trains on one controller which is cool. It comes with some track but I got some extra add ons and created a nice big loop. Overall really fun it looks great around my Christmas tree
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Good, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Lego train set, but I don't think it's worth $150. I guess the expense is in the motor and remote control and that you can control the train via an app. But that still seems like a steep price. For that amount of money, it should come with more track. It's just a small oval. But my kids like it and play with it regularly. I guess it also makes a good base for a Lego city as you can create buildings all around the track.
customer_reviews.author: Brent V

customer_reviews.title: Lego wins again
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter fell in love with this Lego train at a friend's house. She was thrilled to receive it for Christmas. And what is even better is that she could put it all together herself and set the track and play with it immediately. It would be nice if Lego would include more track so that you can do more than have a circle. You can get more track, but it is prohibitively expensive and hard to come by. The switches are even harder to find. But other than that, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Famous

customer_reviews.title: Great Train Set.
customer_reviews.text: Very thrilled with this lego set. We have a O gauge set and I would say for a kid who is not ready for an electric train (or at least we aren’t ready for him due to real shock risk) this train is amazing. I think it runs better than the O gauge. I did wish more track came with it but can be bought separately. I do recommend it and my 6 year old put it together with very limited assistance. It is pricey but the quality of the functioning turned out to be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Pure LEGO quality
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old son has many trains. This one stands apart. He absolutely loves it. And the quality is what you can expect from LEGO. Very smooth running. Quiet. He can play with it for hours. And when he gets bored, it's LEGO, he reimagines the cars and makes them into something new.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Percival

customer_reviews.title: Had high expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought this train for my 4 year old nephew who's been wanting a train set for months. We spent days trying to set it up which I guess is part of the adventure. It somehow didn't wow me once it was finished. My expectations were a little high I guess. I'll have buy some more tracks I guess because as the other reviewers said, if it goes fast enough it runs out of track space. And maybe if I get some more parts it will be a little more exciting which I guess is the whole point of legos haha
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Scott

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Train
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 yr old will sit for hours following the instructions and build big sets, and he did chores for a couple of weeks to help earn this. He built it over 2 days, and it works great, he was really pleased with it. The tracks it comes with will make a basic circular track, he really wanted more track right away and we would recommend budgeting for the additional boxes of track pieces...the train is cool enough it's worth really making a fun larger track to make use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: This Lego Train is exactly what a 5 yr old needed
customer_reviews.text: He's been saving $ and asking for this train for almost a year now and it's the best thing Santa could have brought him for Christmas! He's 5 and finished it in 2 hours tops and it provided him with days of entertainment! The tracks that come with it are ok, but if you want to really make a 5 yr old happy, better get some more tracks for it~
customer_reviews.author: 3fan

customer_reviews.title: Open box, missing piece!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my son’s birthday and didn’t check the package until a couple of days ago. The Lego box was open inside the package and a train plate is missing, so we are not able to build one of the train cars. Very disappointing! The train itself is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO train set
customer_reviews.text: Great LEGO train set. Fun build for my 6 yr old son. It only comes with 1 oval track as shown on the box. I ended up purchasing additional LEGO track to expand set. Also make sure you turn off after each use unless you have an unlimited supply of AA batteries. The on/off function could be a little more user friendly. Especially for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sturm

customer_reviews.title: Price is not relavant to the train set
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed once I saw my 6 year grandson's remote control train in action. I am so glad we bought extra track. First thought came to mind, I finally got ripped off by Lego for paying $159.00 and for what. Yes he did put it together by himself and he operates it with no problems. I have spent a ton on Lego's for him and his cousins and will continue to do so. If you are considering the remote control train set in my opinion be ready for a boring play time. There is o imagine required.
customer_reviews.author: EC Gerloff

customer_reviews.title: A great LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: This was a requested birthday gift. He watched for it to arrive every day💜 and began working on it an hour after it did. My thank you note was wonderful and sincere. “Oma, you always get me the best presents. Thank you.”
customer_reviews.author: Micah's Oma

customer_reviews.title: Cool Lego train set
customer_reviews.text: Really nice train set, especially if you have other Lego City products to go along with it. The power pack and motor integrate really nicely into the train. Of course, we will always want more tracks! I recommend getting some rechargeable batteries for this so you don't eat through them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool but missing some pieces
customer_reviews.text: My son has completed many Legos and this is the second large train. Unfortunately this is the first LEGO set we have ever bought that was missing pieces. Also the most expensive to date. They were just cosmetic pieces and didn’t prevent the ‘build’ or using the train, just a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of One

customer_reviews.title: High quality kit.  Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The train runs around at high speed with to problems staying on the track. Generally the same high quality of Lego toys, and horribly overpriced. You can control the train with an app on any bluetooth phone. Handy when you kid loses the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Kinstle III

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!!!  Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I'm really glad I bought it! Of course depending upon the size of your Lego town, you more than likely will want to purchase additional track!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids liked it.  Wish it had more tracks
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it. It was fun to build and it works well. It stays on the tracks nicely, even when running backwards. I wish it came with more tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Larry S.

customer_reviews.title: pricey.
customer_reviews.text: too pricey, kids play with it one day and get bored after one day, it keeps falling and needs a lot of other tracka to make it fun... for this price better er you buy a real lego to keep somewhere...
customer_reviews.author: R. Rabih

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Wont even gift to my enemies.spent two hours plus making it. Reguires 9 set of AAA battries and the train keeps stopping or getting off the tracks.my son got so frustrated with it .he asked me to return it after playing 10 minutes with it.
customer_reviews.author: jamaia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: BD gift for my daughter. She loves it! But it needs a lot of batteries and it can be used up quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Dongxue SHI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, well made train with variable speed forward and reverse.
customer_reviews.text: My son Loves it! Great quality train set. Will be looking for more track soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great train!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old nephew really loved this train! It runs well and stays on the track, even at high speed. He put it together by himself in about an hour or so - but he is an experienced lego-kit-assembler!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Corrieri

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any Lego set
customer_reviews.text: In true lego fashion super easy to assemble lots of fun. Purchased under the guise of it being for the kids “ But it was really for me ;)” The bonus is that it provides tons of fun for the kids and I. And made an excellent addition to our Lego city.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic train. (missing the stickers)
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected except that our package did not have the stickers that is part of the train's design. Super minor issue, but still.
customer_reviews.author: Roshan

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: It didn't take my son too long to build. He had to get like 3 extra boxes of tracks to make it go around the room. He enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this product. It’s solid and doesn’t make a lot of noise like most kids toys these days. Legos are a bit expensive but the quality is top notch. Unlike some of the other presents my 7 year old received for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer2020

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: First Lego train set. Kids loved building and playing with it. One thing to know, batteries are not included. You will need 10 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old LOVES this set. He was a big Thomas fan but not ready for the electric “big kid” model train set that his grandfather has.
customer_reviews.author: BPinNY

customer_reviews.title: Quality is  wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift. My son is VERY pleased with the quality of the construction
customer_reviews.author: Ian Kahler

customer_reviews.title: I love legos
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic train with lots of little features. The ONLY reason i take 2 stars is because it comes with very little track is pretty much a circle.
customer_reviews.author: Braden gallucci

customer_reviews.title: Fun set except how much you will spend on batteries
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old loves this set. It was easy for him to put together by himself. My only issue is the amount of batteries it takes. The battery life is basically zero. After replacing batteries 2x I just stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun LEGO train
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves his LEGO train. He has enjoyed it very much. He put it all together in an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris O.

customer_reviews.title: Missing critical pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and when I opened it up it was missing 2 vital pieces, the battery pack and controller. Did not open immediately when received so can't do anything about it now.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: make sure to set it up and connect it with the app; kids love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love It
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is fun to build and works great. The box was missing a few pieces, no big deal. A bit more flexibility with the tracks vs the usual oval would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: He Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson Loves this train. He could not wait to put it together. We did purchase additional tracks and the lighting system, but that didn't last. Thank you for an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A 5 year can set this LEGO train set up by himself.
customer_reviews.text: I did not get involved with train set. My five year old grandson set it up by himself. He put it together in3 hours. He put all his LEGO together with help of the instructions provided.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD MACCHI

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It took my 7 year old grandson 3 hours to put together by himself. It goes from slow to warp speed with adjustment. It's a great train set, but I would highly recommend getting the extra tracks. The circle it comes with throws the train off the track when at high speed! :)
customer_reviews.author: Lora Wright

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GIFT, Grandson was so happy after his other one broke down! Much better quality than others!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Lego City
customer_reviews.text: The Child Loved it, however his father couldnt figure it out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and it works great! The app is great, it makes train sounds which really makes the train even more fun to operate.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID S PAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Great LEGO Set!
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love legos and what child doesn’t love trains. Combined this makes a wonderful set. Very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: 89Dime

customer_reviews.title: Great hobby
customer_reviews.text: Grandson put it together in just a couple of hours and had it on the track
customer_reviews.author: nanette manfre

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: A lot of work to put together but a lot of fun as well! Nice if it came with more track.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: LEGO City Train
customer_reviews.text: This was high on my granddaughter’s wish list and she was delighted to get it for Christmas. She put it together that afternoon. Wish it came with more track!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great train!
customer_reviews.text: Another great LEGO product. Grandkids are excited to see it in operation.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Kolwinska

customer_reviews.title: Need batteries but fun to play with.
customer_reviews.text: This set is a good buy but you do need more tracks which are sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Jolleen Strom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy and was a hit for Christmas. Getting extra track Is a must but durability and hours of fun is what me and my son enjoy. Couldn't find this in any stores so amazon came through. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Quite a project, and much loved by the 13 year-old that received it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Power up Train!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old had this built in about 2 hours. He absolutely loves it. Great quality and very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Blwone

customer_reviews.title: figured it out
customer_reviews.text: I have figured it out why it stopped working it is a nice product less star because tracks are short and battery hub is placed in a difficult to reach place
customer_reviews.author: Seaat

customer_reviews.title: Fun to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Put the set together over several days with my 5 year old grandson. He greatly enjoyed the project. Once complete, the electric train set that HE built is tons of fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware...Pieces Missing.
customer_reviews.text: The package was clearly opened and resealed. After unboxing it was missing the key electronic equipment that makes the train move (remote control and power box for the train). Highly disappointed in LEGO and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Weber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves this train set and plays with it all the time. We purchased additional tracks so he changes up the track formation and the lego city he has around. it. Nice addition to the Lego City sets.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and fun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 10 year old. Took him few hours to put it together, but he managed to get it assembled all by himself. He absolutely loves this train set.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Varchenko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So cool. Bought some extra tracks and seriously want to get another one of the trains because of this one.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great engineering toy
customer_reviews.text: Helps lego masters dive into building and learn to understand how mechanics are involved in train propulsion and the building of the track to show how they interact. My son incorporated the freight train and the passenger train into a loop with switches. Allows him to be very creative.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this train is fast! Got to buy additional tracks!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ballew

customer_reviews.title: Lego
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas present. Arrived quickly and my son loved it!
customer_reviews.author: 4Ms

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, kids love.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good shipping speed, as described. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cntrls Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 11 year old. He had it together quickly. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: amy beth henson

customer_reviews.title: We love Lego trains.
customer_reviews.text: We love lego trains...hard to not like them. Thanks for the product...it was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope the train track can be longr .
customer_reviews.text: The kid can't go out ,he is very happy with the electric remote control lego.
customer_reviews.author: zhou yu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is good, easy to assemble, but battery consumption is super fast. That too it takes 10

product_meta.title: LEGO City Passenger Train 60197 Building Kit (677 Pieces), Standard
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingClimb aboard the LEGO City 60197 Passenger Train! This hot train toy features a motorized engine with 10-speed Bluetooth remote control and opening nose cone, train driver’s cabin with opening window, 2 passenger carriages with removable roofs, seats and tables, a full circular track with 16 curved and 4 straight rails, plus traffic lights, a buildable train platform with 2 seats and train service map, train signal and 4 LEGO minifigures.
feature_bullets: Build a remote control passenger train set with motorized engine, 2 cars, platform, signals and configurable circular track with this train set and tracks for kids!
Use a 10-speed Bluetooth remote control to operate the motorized railway toy and take the 4 minifigures on their journey: 2 passengers, a train conductor and a train attendant
677 pieces – Train set for boys and girls aged between 6 and 12 and for fans and kids of all ages
The LEGO City Passenger Train 60197 construction set can be built together with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO building bricks for creative construction

Passenger Train locomotive with cars measures over 4-inch (11cm) high, 27-inch (69cm) long and 1-inch (5cm) wide Engine section measures over 4-inch (11cm) high, 10-inch (26cm) long and 1-inch (5cm) wide Platform measures over 2-inch (7cm) high, 4-inch (11cm) wide and 2-inch (6cm) deep
